txt.en: To further hinder the spread of the vile deep-claws will indeed be a boon to the efforts of the dwarves in Khazad-d√ªm. The creatures waylay any explorers brave enough to venture into the halls, and they ever befoul the passages with their filth.
Deep-claws have burrowed through the roots of Redhorn the Cruel, White Silvertine, and Grey Cloudyhead to further sully and curse the Black Pit that is Moria.
